blogPost.excerpt: CopyCat is a DeepFake app for content creators. Users can create hilarious prank videos, viral social media content, celebrity lip syncs, and more with just the touch of a button!
blogPost.body: CopyCat is a DeepFake app for content creators. Users can create hilarious prank videos, viral social media content, celebrity lip syncs, and more with just the touch of a button!
blogPost.title: CopyCat A‪I‬ - Swap your face and become anybody instantly
blogPost.author: Kevin William David

localize.description: CopyCat是一款面向内容创作者的DeepFake应用。用户只需轻触按钮，就可以创建搞笑的恶作剧视频、病毒式社交媒体内容、名人唇语同步等。
localize.tagline: 换上你的脸，瞬间变成任何人

localize.description: CopyCat是一款面向內容創作者的DeepFake應用。用戶只需輕觸按鈕，就可以創建搞笑的惡作劇視頻、病毒式社交媒體內容、名人脣語同步等。
localize.tagline: 換上你的臉，瞬間變成任何人

previous.excerpt: Prefix helps your business get started with RPA without expensive implementation partners. Automate repetitive work on web and desktop apps that don't have API’s or clean software integrations, and save your team valuable time.
previous.title: Prefix - Build custom computer automations anywhere

localize.description: Prefix帮助您的企业开始使用RPA，而无需昂贵的实施伙伴。在没有API或干净的软件集成的Web和桌面应用程序上自动完成重复性工作，并为您的团队节省宝贵的时间。
localize.tagline: 在任何地方建立自定义的计算机自动化系统

localize.description: Prefix幫助您的企業開始使用RPA，而無需昂貴的實施夥伴。在沒有API或乾淨的軟件集成的Web和桌面應用程序上自動完成重複性工作，併爲您的團隊節省寶貴的時間。
localize.tagline: 在任何地方建立自定義的計算機自動化系統

next.excerpt: 🧠 Smart, personalized product recommendations for Shopify stores--driven by real customer insights. 💥 Our AI algorithm is trained by millions of data points about what customers want, specifically for fashion products.
next.title: YesPlz - Personalized fashion recommendations for Shopify

localize.description: 🧠 为Shopify商店提供智能、个性化的产品推荐--由真实的客户洞察力驱动。💥 我们的人工智能算法是通过数百万个数据点进行训练，了解客户的需求，特别是时尚产品。
localize.tagline: 为Shopify提供个性化的时尚推荐

localize.description: 🧠 爲Shopify商店提供智能、個性化的產品推薦--由真實的客戶洞察力驅動。💥 我們的人工智能算法是通過數百萬個數據點進行訓練，瞭解客戶的需求，特別是時尚產品。
localize.tagline: 爲Shopify提供個性化的時尚推薦
